item.description: Enjoy a full moon hike on Monday, Feb. 25 out at the wild and mostly undeveloped north end of Plymouth Long Beach. We will meet at Sandyâ€™s Restaurant, within the main parking lot for Long Beach, and then carpool in 4-WD vehicles to the Goldenrod Field Station located just north of the crossover on Ryder Way. From there it's a 2.5 - 3 mile round trip around the end of Long Beach and afterwards we can relax at the field station. The tide should allow for this unless we get a storm, in which case we'll have to postpone. When replying, please note if you can bring a 4-WD vehicle, so we can make sure everyone has a ride. Limited to 12 people

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Full Moon Hike at the North End of Plymouth Long Beach
